overview: Sam, a convicted elite hacker works for the Cybersec Corporation' under Elle's supervision. His friend Aman has hacked a "data security platform" known as MYSOIL and sells the data to a criminal group known as CARRIE in Bangkok. Sam is arrested and interrogated by investigators in Malaysia. In the meantime, Aqil, a mercenary with his own agenda leading Sam to find the mastermind behind the manipulation of data and the spread of "Fake News" that is capable of endangering his country.
title: Proksi
